msbt.message: It's Monday, !

I relaxed and pampered myself all day yesterday, so my complexion is looking positively radiant! Of course, we'll see how long I can keep this gorgeous glow going. I do hope it lasts until at least Thursday.
The way we spend today will set the tone for our entire week. So get that chin up and put that smile on!
When I see how hard you're working, it inspires me to work hard too. Doing what? Well, that's a secret.
I've been cleaning and organizing like never before. I tell you, I've been swept up in this decluttering craze!
I was tidying up my photos and so many memories came rushing backI wonder how my friends in those pictures are doing now? Goodness, I hope they haven't forgotten me!
I was cleaning out a messy drawer when I found an old concert ticket.The feelings that came rushing back! I started dancing my heart out right there in my house!

The most surprising thing I've come across is an old letter from a friend with money inside.I knew she'd sent me what few Bells she had at the time. I just couldn't bring myself to spend them. Perhaps it's time to surprise her with a little letter of my own.
It's Wednesday, and you know what that means We're on our way toward the weekend!
That's why my goal today is to get to sleep early! I want to be fresh and ready for the end of the week. Of course, with my busy schedule, I'll probably end up going to bed late after all, .
To burn off this midweek stress, I like to put on some music and dance around my house. One little favor, though Don't stop by at that time. I wouldn't want you to see me like that, .
On days like this, I like to reward myself with a refreshing . It's just the boost I need to make it through the rest of the week, !
My goodness, the week is already more than halfway over!
This is about the time I start looking tired and worn down But, no! Not this time! I shall take a rejuvenating bath tonight and power through the rest of the week in style, !
I was feeling a wee bit worn out, but talking to you has perked me right up! Thank you, .
I swear time goes by faster and faster each week. Oh dear! Is this what it means to be an adult?
At long last, today is Friday!
I hope you have some fun plans for your weekend, .As for me, I'm going to do nothing but relax and enjoy some ME time. I do enjoy my own company.
It was a long week, wasn't it? And yetit also felt like it flew by.Time has a funny way of playing tricks on us.
Some people like to go wild on Friday nights. I suppose if they're having fun, well, good for them. It's not as though I'm jealous or anything.
At last! The weekend has finally arrived!
Although I still don't have plans Wait, noâ€”I mean, of COURSE I have plans! I'm going toumdevote some time to self-improvement! Yes, that's exactly what I'm going to do!
Ahhh Saturday I can't tell you how much I've been looking forward to doing absolutely nothing.
And since it's Saturday, that means it's time to put on my dancing shoes!
Weekend fashion can be terribly tricky, don't you think?

It's entirely appropriate to be seen in your casual clothing, for example. And yet, one mustn't look too casual. For goodness sake, you don't want people to think you got your outfit out of your dirty clothes basket! Even if that's exactly where you've gotten it from, darling.
It's the perfect time to put on your best outfit and hit the island!But it's also the perfect time to put on your pajamas and not take them off again until Monday. Decisions! Decisions!
I mean, one shouldn't relax one's sense of style just because it's the weekend. And yet, that's not an easy task when relaxing is all one wants to do.
